title: 为啥1.6.2不能安装buildcraft啊！！一放进去游戏就崩溃~~谁来帮帮忙看看啊
author: ZXCSSSS
txt_content:
这里是崩溃报告~~~本人新手 求解释啊  万分感激！！！！！！！！！
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad. I'll do better next time, I promise!

Time: 14-9-30 上午12:20
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: A mod has attempted to assign BlockID 4068 to the Fluid 'oil' but this Fluid has already been linked to BlockID 1530. Configure your mods to prevent this from happening.

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content: 是在尝试进服务器的时候出现的吗？
你下的是1.6.2的吗  看看是不是版本不对

replies.txt_content:
Bruce.Owen 发表于 2014-9-30 04:23
是在尝试进服务器的时候出现的吗？
不是阿，我自己单机玩，下载这个MOD 一放到文件夹里就启动不了游戏了   下的是1.6.2版本的
